not-allowed-to-place-bet: You can no longer place a bet
tiebreaker-1: Number of points recorded for all group stage matches played
tiebreaker-2: Goal difference for all group stage matches played
tiebreaker-3: Number of goals scored for all group stage matches played
tiebreaker-4: Number of points recorded for the matches between the teams in question
tiebreaker-5: Goal difference in terms of matches between the teams in question
tiebreaker-6: Number of goals scored in the matches between the teams in question
tiebreaker-obs: The tip does not take into account ranking in addition to the above criteria. In betting where teams still cannot be distinguished according to criteria 1-6, alphabetical order will decide.
user-not-placed-bet: The user has not placed a bet
when-tournament-starts-you-can-see: You can see other peoples bets when the tournament starts
error-saving: Could not save bet, please try again
all-games-must-be-filled-in: All games must be filled in
missing-penalty-winner: A match in the playoffs that ends in a draw is missing a penalty winner
finals-points-explanation: Correct result: {{correctResult}} p + Correct 1/X/2: {{correct1x2}} p = {{result}} p
